input:
Question: Can you please list all the ingredients? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 1/2 cup butter, softened, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 cup white sugar, 1/3 cup milk, 1/2 pound ground walnuts, 1/3 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration, 
Directions: 0) Beat together cream cheese and margarine until well blended. 1) Add flour, mixing well. 2) Shape into a ball, cover and chill for 2 hours. 3) In saucepan over medium heat, cook sugar and milk, stirring occasionally until milk boils and sugar is dissolved. 4) Add the ground nuts. 5) Remove from heat and let cool until mixture is of spreading consistency. 6) Roll out chilled dough on lightly floured surface to a rectangle about 18 X 12 inches. 7) Cut in half lengthwise. 8) Spread each piece with milk/nut filling and roll up like a jelly-roll, starting from the long side. 9) Cut each roll in half. 10) Place seam side down on ungreased cookie sheets (two on a baking sheet). 11) Leaving roll's shape intact, cut into slices 1/2 inch thick almost to the bottom of the roll. 12) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 15 to 20 minutes or till done. 13) Remove from sheet and sprinkle with confectioners' sugar. 14) Cool on racks. 15) Cut cookies all the way through. 16) Refrigerate or freeze. 17) Resprinkle with confectioners' sugar before serving.
conv_answer: First two are 1 package cream cheese, softened and 1/2 cup butter, softened.

Question: Sure let me know. 2 cups all-purpose flour What is next? 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 2 cups white sugar, 1 cup vegetable oil, 3 eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup chopped walnuts, 1 (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained, 2 cups carrots, grated, 1 cup flaked coconut, 1/2 cup butter, 1 cup white sugar, 1/2 cup buttermilk, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease a 9x13 inch pan. 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and cinnamon. 3) Set aside. 4) In a large bowl, combine the sugar and oil until blended. 5) Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. 6) Stir in the flour mixture just until incorporated. 7) Fold in the pineapple, carrots, coconut and walnuts. 8) Pour batter into prepared pan. 9) Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. 10) While still warm, poke holes in the cake with a fork. 11) For the glaze: In a saucepan, combine butter, sugar, buttermilk and vanilla. 12) Bring mixture to a boil over medium heat, then reduce heat and cook for 5 minutes. 13) Pour glaze over warm cake, then allow to cool completely.
conv_answer: The next two are 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon and 2 cups white sugar.

 Context: Ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 2 cups white sugar, 1 cup vegetable oil, 3 eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup chopped walnuts, 1 (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained, 2 cups carrots, grated, 1 cup flaked coconut, 1/2 cup butter, 1 cup white sugar, 1/2 cup buttermilk, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease a 9x13 inch pan. 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and cinnamon. 3) Set aside. 4) In a large bowl, combine the sugar and oil until blended. 5) Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. 6) Stir in the flour mixture just until incorporated. 7) Fold in the pineapple, carrots, coconut and walnuts. 8) Pour batter into prepared pan. 9) Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. 10) While still warm, poke holes in the cake with a fork. 11) For the glaze: In a saucepan, combine butter, sugar, buttermilk and vanilla. 12) Bring mixture to a boil over medium heat, then reduce heat and cook for 5 minutes. 13) Pour glaze over warm cake, then allow to cool completely.
conv_answer: Yes, 3 more ingredients. 1 cup white sugar, half a cup buttermilk and 1 teaspoon vanilla extract.

input:
Question: Wow! Could you tell me the ingredients first? 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 6 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped, 1/2 cup unsalted butter, 2 1/2 cups dark brown sugar, 3 eggs, 1 1/2 tablespoons vanilla extract, 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup water, 6 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped, 1/4 cup unsalted butter, 1 egg yolk, 4 cups confectioners' sugar, 2 tablespoons vanilla extract, 2 tablespoons heavy cream, 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 2 cups bittersweet chocolate chips, 1 cup heavy cream, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease and flour 2 (9 inch) pans. 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt. 3) Set aside. 4) In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 5) Remove from heat and allow to cool to lukewarm. 6) In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy. 7) Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in 1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla. 8) Stir in the melted chocolate. 9) Beat in the flour mixture alternately with the sour cream. 10) Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin). 11) Pour batter into prepared pans. 12) Bake in the preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. 13) Let cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely. 14) Make the Chocolate Buttercream Frosting: In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 15) In a large bowl, whip the butter for about 10 minutes until it is super fluffy, beat in egg yolk. 16) Gradually blend in the confectioners' sugar, alternating with 2 tablespoons vanilla and 2 tablespoons cream, then blend in the melted chocolate. 17) Beat in the softened cream cheese. 18) Make the Ganache: In a large saucepan, combine chocolate chips and 1 cup heavy cream. 19) Heat, stirring constantly, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 20) Remove from heat and set aside. 21) Assemble the cake: When cake is completely cooled, cover the bottom cake layer with as much ganache as desired. 22) Refrigerate for 5 minutes, or until ganache has set. 23) Spread frosting over the ganache. 24) Cover with top layer of cake. 25) Frost top and sides with buttercream, and garnish with more ganache.
conv_answer: Yes. The first two ingredients are 2 1 fourth cups all-purpose flour and 2 teaspoons baking soda.

Directions: 0) In a large mixing bowl, dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup of water. 1) Add sugar, oil, salt, rye or whole wheat flour, 3 cups all-purpose flour, and remaining water; beat until smooth. 2) Add enough remaining all-purpose flour to form a soft dough. 3) Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes. 4) Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top. 5) Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour. 6) Punch dough down. 7) Divide in half. 8) On a greased baking sheet, flatten each half to 1-in. 9) Pierce each loaf several times with a fork. 10) Cover and let rise in a warm place until nearly doubled, about 30 minutes. 11) Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.

Question: I love tea as well. How should I make it?

Directions: 0) Place the cranberries and water into a large pot. 1) Bring to a boil and cook just until the berries pop, about 5 minutes. 2) Remove from the heat and let stand at room temperature until cold, several hours. 3) Strain out the cranberries and stir the orange juice, pineapple juice, lemon juice and sugar into the liquid. 4) Add the cinnamon stick, whole cloves and allspice berries. 5) Bring to a low boil.

Question: Good how many ingredients are there? 
 Context: Ingredients: 3 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 3 apples - peeled, cored and sliced, 1 cup white sugar, 1 cup brown sugar, 1 1/4 cups vegetable oil, 2 eggs, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 1 cup chopped walnuts, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease and flour a 9x13 inch pan. 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda, cinnamon and salt. 3) Combine the apples and the white sugar; set aside. 4) In a large bowl, mix together the brown sugar, oil, eggs and vanilla. 5) Stir in the apple mixture, then the flour mixture. 6) Fold in the walnuts. 7) Pour batter into prepared pan. 8) Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. 9) Allow to cool.
conv_answer: The first two are 3 cups of all-purpose flour and 1 teaspoon baking soda. There are 11 ingredients.

Question: Sounds cool! How should I start? 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 cups pineapple juice, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 2 tablespoons light soy sauce (50% less sodium), 1 1/2 tablespoons white vinegar, 2 garlic cloves, crushed, 3 tablespoons minced fresh ginger, 1 1/4 pounds raw firm fish, such as salmon, tuna or halibut, cut in chunks, 4 cups fresh pineapple in large chunks (or substitute canned pineapple chunks), 1 large red onion, cut in wedges, 
Directions: 0) In a small saucepan, dissolve cornstarch in pineapple juice. 1) Add soy sauce, vinegar, garlic and ginger. 2) Simmer until slightly thickened, about 7 minutes. 3) Let cool. 4) Add fish and pineapple to sauce and marinate in the refrigerator for 30 minutes. 5) Thread fish, pineapple and onion on skewers. 6) Place on a hot grill (or under a broiler) until fish is done to your liking. 7) Serve with rice.
conv_answer: We can start with preparing the ingredients! The first two are 2 cups pineapple juice and 1 tablespoon cornstarch.

input:
Question: Yes, that sounds tasty. Could you give me the ingredients so I can prepare them? 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 cups chopped, cooked chicken meat, 2 cups fresh chopped broccoli, 1/2 cup chopped onion, 1/2 cup chopped green bell pepper, 1 1/2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons Dijon-style prepared mustard, salt and pepper to taste, 1 tablespoon minced garlic, 1 (8 ounce) package refrigerated crescent rolls, 
Directions: 0) In a large bowl, combine the chicken, broccoli, onions, bell pepper, cheese, mayonnaise, mustard, salt, pepper and garlic. 1) Mix all together. 2) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 3) Cover a cookie sheet with aluminum foil. 4) Place a glass upside down in the center of the cookie sheet. 5) Roll out crescent rolls around the base of the glass, with pointy ends away from the glass; when you're finished, the arrangement will look like the sun. 6) Spoon some of the chicken mixture onto the thick part of each crescent roll. 7) Fold the pointy end of each roll over the top of the mixture and tuck in the middle. 8) Remove glass from cookie sheet. 9) Arrangement of rolls will now look like a fluted tube cake. 10) Bake in preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes, or until rolls are golden brown.
conv_answer: Sure! the first two are 2 cups chopped, cooked chicken meat and  2 cups fresh chopped broccoli.

Directions: 0) In a large bowl, combine the chicken, broccoli, onions, bell pepper, cheese, mayonnaise, mustard, salt, pepper and garlic. 1) Mix all together. 2) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 3) Cover a cookie sheet with aluminum foil. 4) Place a glass upside down in the center of the cookie sheet. 5) Roll out crescent rolls around the base of the glass, with pointy ends away from the glass; when you're finished, the arrangement will look like the sun. 6) Spoon some of the chicken mixture onto the thick part of each crescent roll. 7) Fold the pointy end of each roll over the top of the mixture and tuck in the middle. 8) Remove glass from cookie sheet. 9) Arrangement of rolls will now look like a fluted tube cake. 10) Bake in preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes, or until rolls are golden brown.
conv_answer: Yes, you still need 1 tablespoon minced garlic and 1 (8 ounce) package refrigerated crescent rolls.

 Context: Ingredients: 3/4 teaspoon active dry yeast, 1/2 cup warm water, 3 1/2 cups unbleached bread flour, 1 1/4 cups cold water, 
Directions: 0) Place the warm water in a small bowl, and sprinkle the yeast over the top. 1) Let stand until yeast has dissolved and is foamy, about 15 minutes. 2) Measure flour into a large bowl. 3) Make a well in the center, and pour in the yeast mixture and cold water. 4) Use a sturdy spoon to mix it together until sticky and difficult to stir, but nevertheless thoroughly combined. 5) Cover and allow to ferment for 24 hours in the refrigerator before using. 6) Store in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.
conv_answer: Good, the next two ingredients are 3 and a half cups unbleached bread flour and one and one fourth of a cup of cold water.

input:
Question: Yay! Sounds delicious. Can you give me the ingredients first? 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 medium cooking apples, peeled, cored, and chopped, 2/3 cup fresh or frozen blueberries, 1 tablespoon heat-stable granular sugar substitute, 1/2 teaspoon apple pie spice or ground allspice, 1 1/3 cups whole wheat pastry flour, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/3 cup extra-virgin olive oil, 3 tablespoons low-fat milk, 
Directions: 0) In a medium bowl combine apples, blueberries, sugar substitute, and the 1/4 teaspoon apple pie spice; set aside. 1) In another medium bowl stir together whole wheat pastry flour, kosher salt, and the 1/8 teaspoon apple pie spice. 2) Add oil and milk all at once to flour mixture. 3) Stir lightly with a fork until dough comes together. 4) Divide dough into 6 portions. 5) Using six 3 1/2- to 4-inch individual tart pans with removable bottoms, press one dough portion on the bottom and up the side of each tart pan. 6) Divide fruit mixture among pastry-lined pans. 7) Place tart pans on a large baking sheet. 8) Place a large piece of foil over tart pans; press down lightly around the edges to seal. 9) Bake in a 375 degrees F oven for 20 minutes; remove foil. 10) Bake about 20 minutes more or until fruit is tender. 11) Let cool in tart pans on a wire rack for 15 minutes. 12) Carefully remove sides of tart pans. 13) Serve warm or cool.
conv_answer: Sure first 2 medium cooking apples. They should be peeled, cored, and chopped.
target_answer: 2 medium cooking apples, peeled, cored, and chopped

conv_answer: You should do it for 20 minutes. Then remove the foil and then bake about 20 minutes again. It will be ready when the fruit is tender.

Question: Ok yes please. 1 medium head garlic Ok I have those at home already. What is next? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 medium head garlic, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, 1/2 cup white wine, 2 tablespoons butter, 1 cup milk, 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 1) Slice the top of the head of garlic, just enough to remove paper and expose the tops of the cloves. 2) Drizzle with olive oil and roast in preheated oven, either in a clay garlic roaster or wrapped in aluminum foil. 3) Roast for 20 minutes or until cloves are soft and slip from skins when pushed. 4) Change oven setting to broil (375 degrees F, 190 degrees C). 5) Let garlic cool. 6) To prepare chicken, place in a 9x13 inch baking dish and splash both sides with white wine. 7) Broil for 25 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear. 8) Meanwhile, place butter or margarine and milk in a large skillet and heat over medium heat until warm. 9) Stir in the flour and cheese. 10) Stir over medium heat until sauce begins to thicken. 11) Slip cooled garlic cloves from skin and add to the sauce (if desired, mince first). 12) Add chopped parsley. 13) Bring nearly to a boil; reduce heat and stir to control thickening. 14) If desired, pour sauce over cooked rice or pasta and top with broiled chicken. 15) Enjoy!
conv_answer: Nice! The next two are 4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts and half a cup of white wine.

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 1) Butter one Madeleine pan. 2) Sift the flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt together. 3) Cream the butter with the vanilla and the sugar. 4) Add the egg and egg yolks, beating to mix. 5) Stir in the dry ingredients until just combined only, do not over mix. 6) Place rounded teaspoon of batter into the prepared Madeleine shell forms. 7) Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 12 minutes. 8) Remove from oven and immediately invert onto a wire rack to cool. 9) Once cool sprinkle with confectioners' sugar, if desired.

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F ( 175 degrees C). 1) Lightly grease a 9 inch springform pan. 2) In a small bowl, mix together 1 1/2 cups chocolate wafer crumbs, 2 tablespoons sugar, and melted butter. 3) Press onto the bottom and 1 1/2 inch up the sides of the prepared 9 inch springform pan. 4) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 minutes. 5) Allow to cool. 6) Reduce oven temperature to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). 7) To Make Filling: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1/4 cup chocolate chips, stirring constantly, until chips are melted. 8) In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and 1 cup of sugar until smooth. 9) Add cocoa and beat well. 10) Add eggs and beat on low until just blended. 11) Stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla and reserved chocolate mixture until blended. 12) Pour over crust. 13) Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 45 to 50 minutes or until center is almost set. 14) To Make Topping: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1 teaspoon vanilla until just before boiling. 15) Stir constantly and be careful not to boil over. 16) Have 1 1/2 cups chocolate chips ready in a small bowl. 17) Pour in the hot cream and stir with a spoon until smooth. 18) Spread over baked cheesecake and refrigerate overnight.
conv_answer: The next three are one quarter of a cup of semisweet chocolate chips, one quarter of a cup of heavy whipping cream and 3 packages of cream cheese, softened.

 Context: Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups chocolate cookie crumbs, 2 tablespoons white sugar, 1/4 cup butter, melted, 1/4 cup semisweet chocolate chips, 1/4 cup heavy whipping cream, 3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened, 1 cup white sugar, 1/3 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 3 eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 1/2 cups semisweet chocolate chips, 1/4 cup heavy whipping cream, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F ( 175 degrees C). 1) Lightly grease a 9 inch springform pan. 2) In a small bowl, mix together 1 1/2 cups chocolate wafer crumbs, 2 tablespoons sugar, and melted butter. 3) Press onto the bottom and 1 1/2 inch up the sides of the prepared 9 inch springform pan. 4) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 minutes. 5) Allow to cool. 6) Reduce oven temperature to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). 7) To Make Filling: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1/4 cup chocolate chips, stirring constantly, until chips are melted. 8) In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and 1 cup of sugar until smooth. 9) Add cocoa and beat well. 10) Add eggs and beat on low until just blended. 11) Stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla and reserved chocolate mixture until blended. 12) Pour over crust. 13) Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 45 to 50 minutes or until center is almost set. 14) To Make Topping: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1 teaspoon vanilla until just before boiling. 15) Stir constantly and be careful not to boil over. 16) Have 1 1/2 cups chocolate chips ready in a small bowl. 17) Pour in the hot cream and stir with a spoon until smooth. 18) Spread over baked cheesecake and refrigerate overnight.
conv_answer: Each package should be 8 ounces.
